title: As Ukraine tensions mount, Putin says Russia has 'every right' to 'react harshly to unfriendly steps'
content:
1. As Ukraine tensions mount, Putin says Russia has 'every right' to 'react harshly to unfriendly steps'  CNN
  2. Putin blames West for tensions, demands security guarantees  Associated Press
  3. Putin warns of possible military response over ‘aggressive’ Nato  The Guardian
  4. Putin says Russia has 'nowhere to retreat' over Ukraine  Yahoo News
  5. Putin blames West for tensions as fears rise over Ukraine  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
As Ukraine tensions mount, Putin says Russia has 'every right' to 'react harshly to unfriendly steps'  CNN

Putin says Russia has 'nowhere to retreat' over Ukraine  Yahoo News

localize.title: ウクライナの緊張が高まる中、プーチンはロシアには「非友好的な措置に厳しく反応するあらゆる権利」があると発言。
随着乌克兰紧张局势的加剧，普京称俄罗斯 "完全有权 "对 "不友好的步骤作出严厉的反应
隨着烏克蘭緊張局勢的加劇，普京稱俄羅斯 "完全有權 "對 "不友好的步驟作出嚴厲的反應
